cu.explanation_en: Setting the NGAP log level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and potential startup failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of uplink slots to 20 will cause invalid TDD configuration and cell setup failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行時隙數設定為 20 會導致無效的 TDD 配置，並造成小區設置失敗。
